description: Package of Web browser tools for Windows which allows you to extract the information stored by popular Web browsers, including: IEHistoryView, IECacheView, and IECookiesView - for retrieving the history/cache/cookies information of Internet Explorer. MozillaCacheView, MozillaHistoryView, and MozillaCookiesView - for retrieving the history/cache/cookies information stored by Mozilla Firefox. ChromeCacheView and OperaCacheView - for retrieving the cache information stored by Opera and Chrome Web browsers. FlashCookiesView - for retrieving the Flash cookies information stored by all Web browsers.
